summary:
Junk lantern change to the usable lantern.
It\'s no torch replacer.
You can use both the torch and the lantern.
descriptionHtml:
Sorry, 
This was not enough to MOD files. Please upgrade as soon as possible.

====================================================================
Usable Lantern v0.51
by Higeyosi
====================================================================

I am sorry, but I cannot speak English. Therefore, this sentence uses the machine translation.
I may not understand your words, but please forgive it.


Description
===============
Junk lantern change to the usable lantern.
It\'s no torch replacer.
You can use both the torch and the lantern.


Installation
===============
1- Extract the desired .esp files to your \"Skyrim/Data\" folder
2- Launch Skyrim


Known Issue
===============
- Collision Bug.


Next version up
===============
- Collision fix.
- City guard use the lantern.


Licensing/Legal
===============
Feel free to include or edit, just give me credits for my work.
author: Higeyosi
